channel.title: Bullfighting anyone? [graphic gore video & pictures embedded]
channel.description:
Video embedded kuz I don't know how to disable it.
Came across bullfighting on reddit. Praise be thy reddit. Was watching gore videos on youtube of the matadors getting fucked up. Just watched this one and I'm used to seeing these sorts of pictures/videos but this is just sick. They do deserve it though for torturing the animals so badly.
[b]Warning: Very Graphic Picture Of A Guy Getting A Bull Horn Through His Chin All The Way Up To The Back Of The Left Eyeball And Then Just Wripping Straight Out[/b]Spoiler:camel caps is best way to write a warning http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-kAlrG4jS9M&feature=related
edit - HAHAHAH LOOK AT HIM NOW he looks like the fucking elephant man after surgery: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=iv&annotation_id=annotation_550430&src_vid=-kAlrG4jS9M&v=5zhmsNlX3NY

item.title: Bullfighting anyone? [graphic gore video & pictures embedded]
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

If they didn’t stab it or anything and just had it chase the guys around till either the dude or the bull gets too tired to continue and then the loser gets slain would be better.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullfighting anyone? [graphic gore video & pictures embedded]
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:434320”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=537040.msg3927369#msg3927369 date=1330365020]
When I went to Spain on holiday as a kid (must of been 8-10), I went to watch a bullfight and remember loving it. Now I watch it and I think how the fuck can people do this to animals, and I’m with most people in saying I love seeing a matador get beat by the bull.
[/quote]
id say ripping off a chunk of his face is a bit too much though[/quote]You mean it’s not enough. Bullfighting is just a legal form of torture

Read full topic

Mr.Chris:

When I went to Spain on holiday as a kid (must of been 8-10), I went to watch a bullfight and remember loving it. Now I watch it and I think how the fuck can people do this to animals, and I’m with most people in saying I love seeing a matador get beat by the bull.

id say ripping off a chunk of his face is a bit too much though

item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

When I went to Spain on holiday as a kid (must of been 8-10), I went to watch a bullfight and remember loving it. Now I watch it and I think how the fuck can people do this to animals, and I’m with most people in saying I love seeing a matador get beat by the bull.

item.title: Bullfighting anyone? [graphic gore video & pictures embedded]
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

That was freaking sweet. Better than the one I have recorded on my TV where the horn goes in under the guys chin and out his mouth, then he just pulls it back out the same way. All the guy needed was some stitches in the bottom of his mouth and probably tongue.

Hah. You know, I almost wasn’t going to post the video because I thought you wouldn’t like gore on the forums!

Yeah the original .gif I saw on reddit which lead me to this video was of the one where the horn goes through his neck up out of his mouth. He got very lucky that the bull pulled it back out instead of ripping his entire jaw off. Ergh!

There’s the one

Read full topic
